name: Sokker Mayhem
description:
Play against a friend or AI. This is soccer with bats, guns, bombs, rockets and more!

Don't expect much though, the AI sucks, and there are tons of bugs! Multiplayer only works with 2 controllers.

Gamepad
Move: Left stick
Aim: Right stick
Hit/Shoot: Right trigger
Dash: Left trigger

Keyboard P1
Move/Aim: Arrow keys
Hit/Shoot: X
Dash: Z
